n: Pomegranate Feta Salad with Lemon Dijon Vinaigrette
des: "This tangy, tasty salad is as easy as it is fresh! Everyone raves over this and begs for more! It's perfect for a light lunch or a garden party!"
ins: Place the lettuce, pomegranate seeds, and feta cheese into a large mixing bowl; set aside. Whisk together the lemon juice and zest, mustard, vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a separate bowl. Pour over the salad and toss to coat. Serve immediately.
